title: When designing the exit ramp off US17/I-140 eastbound, why didn\'t DOT plan to route the exit more directly toward Porter\'s Neck Road/Market Street intersection rather than having a T-type intersection with southbound Market Street?  Seems this would have been a safer and more logical design, even if it meant bridging the retention pond in its right-of-way.
